title: AnimalQuest, kids' encyclopedia
text: The main features of the application include quizzes where users can earn points and badges as they learn about different animals. Each quiz is accompanied by a summary about the animal, and a chatbot feature that allows kids to ask for additional information. Moreover, the app offers a storytelling feature using Open AI, the same model as the chatbot.

title: Design handoff - Roller derby website
text: The objective of this project was to replicate a real-world design hand-off scenario, involving close cooperation with a designer and utilizing Figma to execute their design.

title: Fullstack project - Happy thoughts
text: A twitter-like fullstack app receiving and posting data to API. I've focused on creating several API endpoints to practice different HTTP methods.

title: Fullstack project - Movies dataset
text: In this project I list movies for which I have created my own database from an existing dataset, and seeded the data directly from my backend project. I've mainly focused on practicing different mongoose methods and learned how to create a dynamic API documentation.

title: Old-style labyrinth game
text: Old-style game with descriptions and directions to follow using Redux thunks to fetch API.

title: 'Who stole the tuna?' game
text: The classic 'Guess who' board game, made in vanilla JS but this time it's about cats who are tuna thieves.
